availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Muhlenberg County, Kentucky native. Son of Hugh M. Martin and Elizabeth Roark Martin. Commissioned Lieutenant Colonel of the Confederate 10th Kentucky Cavalry on August 13, 1862.

ab.bibl: Adam Rankin Johnson, The Partisan Rangers of the Confederate States Army (Louisville, KY: G.G. Fetter Company, 1904). Find A Grave, “Col Robert Maxwell Martin (1840-1901),” Memorial #36440212, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/36440212/robert-maxwell-martin# (accessed May 16, 2018).
